io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class Aurora.State

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Aurora.State
  • Enclosing class:
    Aurora

    public class Aurora.State
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora state information.

      • getOn

        public boolean getOn()
              throws StatusCodeException
        Gets the on state of the Aurora (true = on, false = off).
        Returns:
        true, if the Aurora is on
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException

          throws StatusCodeException,
                 StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException

        on - whether the Aurora should be turned on or off

      • setBrightness

        public int setBrightness(int brightness)
                  throws StatusCodeException,
                         StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                         StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
        Sets the master brightness of the Aurora.
        Parameters:
        brightness - the new brightness level as a percent
        Returns:
        (204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 422 Unprocessable Entity)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if brightness is not within the maximum (100) and minimum (0) restrictions
        StatusCodeException
